鳴.definition: to cry (of birds, animals and insects); to make a sound; to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)

鳴不平.definition: to cry out against injustice; to protest unfairness

鳴叫.definition: to emit a sound; (of birds, insects etc) to chirp, hoot etc; (of a siren, steam whistle etc) to sound

鳴號.definition: to sound the horn; to honk

鳴謝.definition: to express gratitude (esp. in public); vote of thanks

鳴金.definition: to beat a gong; to sound the retreat

鳴金收兵.definition: to beat the gong to recall troops (idiom); to order a retreat

鳴金收軍.definition: to beat the gong to recall troops (idiom); to order a retreat

鳴鑼開道.definition: to beat the gong to clear the way; (fig.) to pave the way for sth
